name: signoff-flow
description: Manage signoff workflows for product initiatives with GitHub and Jira integration.
long_description: A tool for product teams to manage signoff workflows for initiatives. Includes automatic onboarding (installs gh CLI if needed), project management (clone repos from GitHub), and artifact creation with Jira tickets. Designed for non-technical users like Product Managers.

tools.name: signoff_check_setup
tools.description: Check if the environment is ready. Verifies and automatically installs gh CLI if needed.

tools.name: signoff_list_projects
tools.description: List available projects (local and from GitHub).

tools.name: signoff_select_project
tools.description: Select a project to work with.

tools.name: signoff_status
tools.description: Show current project status and governance configuration.

tools.name: signoff_setup_governance
tools.description: Configure BA, Design and Dev leads, and signoff rules.

tools.name: signoff_advance
tools.description: Advance to the next step of an initiative (PRD → UX → Architecture → Epics → Readiness).

tools.name: signoff_create_jira_tickets
tools.description: Generate Jira tickets to request signoff from leads.
